overview: Invicta FC Phoenix Series 3 is a MMA event that took place Friday, March 6, 2020 with 11 fights at Memorial Hall in Kansas City, Kansas. It includes a full tournament in the Bantam weight class with 4 one-round quarter finals (+2 reverves), 2 one-round semi finals and a three round final. In addition, this event features a bout between Key Hansen and Liana Pirosin, and a Invicta FC Bantam weight Championship title fight between Julija Stoliarenko and Lisa Verzosa. This MMA event also was the first to feature Open Scoring.
title: Invicta FC Phoenix Series 3
